name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software development, emphasizing **test automation**, **functional testing**, **regression testing**, and **end-to-end testing**. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Node.js**, leveraging these technologies to ensure high-quality deliverables. Strong expertise in building and maintaining **CI/CD** pipelines that enhance deployment efficiency and software reliability. 
Skilled in using **Playwright** for robust test automation strategies, ensuring comprehensive coverage and performance of applications. Committed to clear communication and collaboration with cross-functional teams to identify potential issues and drive continuous improvement. Background in developing high-performance applications within healthcare and financial industries, utilizing **Python**, **Flutter**, and frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms and proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, including implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development standards, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong foundation in MLOps, focused on model training, serving, and orchestration with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
